Package io.anserini.collection

Interface SourceDocument

All Known Subinterfaces:
MultifieldSourceDocument
All Known Implementing Classes:
CarCollection.Document, ClueWeb09Collection.Document, ClueWeb12Collection.Document, CoreCollection.Document, HtmlCollection.Document, JsonCollection.Document, NewYorkTimesCollection.Document, TrecCollection.Document, TrecwebCollection.Document, TweetCollection.Document, WashingtonPostCollection.Document, WikipediaCollection.Document
public interface SourceDocument
A raw document from a collection. A SourceDocument is explicitly distinguish a from a Lucene Document, which is the Lucene representation that can be directly inserted into an index.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String content()
    Returns the raw content of the document.
    java.lang.String id()
    Returns the unique identifier of the document.
    boolean indexable()
    Returns whether this document is meant to be indexed.

  • Method Details

    • id

      java.lang.String id()
      Returns the unique identifier of the document.
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the document

    • content

      java.lang.String content()
      Returns the raw content of the document.
      Returns:
      the raw content of the document

    • indexable

      boolean indexable()
      Returns whether this document is meant to be indexed. Certain collections (e.g., ClueWeb) contained metadata records that aren't meant to be indexed.
      Returns:
      true if this document is meant to be indexed
